channel.title: jenkins on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in jenkins on Morgoth

item.title: Jenkins
item.description: Jenkins Jenkins is a self-contained, open source automation server which can be used to automate all sorts of tasks such as building, testing, and deploying software. https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins 安装好Jenkins后安装需要的插件． 安装jenkins: # download jenkins.war and install java8. $ java -jar jenkins.war --httpPort=8080 $ firefox http://localhost:8080
